title: Privacy Policy
description: Learn how Nomadia Travels collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Data Collection
section1.text: We collect only the information necessary to provide and improve our services, including contact details and booking information submitted through our website forms.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.text: Your information is used solely for communication, personalized travel offers, and service improvements. We never sell or share your data with third parties without consent.

section3.title: 3. Data Protection
section3.text: We implement security measures such as encryption and secure storage to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
